title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 71.9 - Amendment of pleadings to conform to proof
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 71.9 - Amendment of pleadings to conform to proof

State Regulations
A motion to conform a pleading to the proof may be made at
any time before the conclusion of the hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
71.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
